Comments_List: A lot of useful graphics techniques!
How to apply computer graphics to sketching, various techniques used and systems developed for sketching, the purpose and importance of sketching
Paper presentations throughout the semester give a broad perspective of what is available in the field of sketching as it relates to computer graphics, freedom to explore anything in final project
Highly recommend to anyone who has knowledge of computer graphics. Greatly broadens perspective of what computer graphics offers
